Package com.lti.swtutils

General utilities for SWT.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MessageBoxRunner Allows us to swap out the code that shows the message box in DefaultMessageBox.
 

Class Summary
DefaultMessageBox Provides convenient way to automatically set title, and otherwise code message boxes with a minimum of code.
DispatchLoop Boilerplate read and dispatch loop.
ExceptionSafeSelectionAdapter Wraps a SelectionListener with catching all Exceptions (logging, error dialog).
LoggedExceptionMessageBox Displays a generic message in place of the actual exception.
ModalShellRunner Encapsulates the default SWT readAndDispatch loop.
NativeMessageBoxRunner Uses SWT native message box.
ResourceManager Utility class for managing OS resources associated with SWT controls such as colors, fonts, images, etc.
SWTUtils  
 

Package com.lti.swtutils Description

General utilities for SWT.
